lyric:
[00:00.00] 作词 : Brown, Christopher Steven / Levine, Ari / Mars, Bruno
[00:00.55] 作曲 : Brown, Christopher Steven / Levine, Ari / Mars, Bruno
[00:01.10]Ahh yes
[00:03.07]
[00:05.43]Well look at here look at here
[00:07.06]Ah what do we have?
[00:08.23]Another pretty thang ready for me to grab
[00:11.30]
[00:11.44]But little does she know
[00:12.68]That I'm a wolf in sheepsclothing
[00:14.24]'Cause at the end of the night
[00:15.87]It is her I'll be holding
[00:17.16]
[00:17.29]I love you so
[00:18.56]That's what you'll say
[00:19.93]You'll tell me
[00:20.64]Baby baby please don't go away
[00:23.00]But when I play, I never stay
[00:25.77]To every girl that I meet here this is what I say:
[00:29.22]
[00:29.50]Run run runaway, runaway baby
[00:31.99]Before I put my spell on you
[00:34.32]You better get get getaway getaway darling
[00:37.92]'Cause everything you heard is true
[00:40.26]Your poor little heart will end up alone
[00:43.29]'Cause what knows I'm a rolling stone
[00:46.02]So you better run run runaway runaway baby
[00:50.32]
[00:55.38]Well let me think let me think
[00:56.73]Ah what should I do?
[00:58.14]So many eager young bunny's
[00:59.85]That I'd like to pursue
[01:01.14]Now even now they eating out the palm of my hand
[01:04.02]There's only one carrot and they all gotta share it
[01:06.95]
[01:07.08]I love you so
[01:08.23]That's what you'll say
[01:09.83]You'll tell me
[01:10.42]Baby baby please don't go away
[01:12.66]But when I play, I never stay
[01:15.48]To every girl that I meet here this is what I say:
[01:18.94]
[01:19.25]Run run runaway, runaway baby
[01:21.87]Before I put my spell on you
[01:24.04]You better get get getaway getaway darling
[01:27.67]'Cause everything you heard is true
[01:29.88]Your poor little heart will end up alone
[01:33.08]'Cause what knows I'm a rolling stone
[01:35.76]So you better run run runaway runaway baby
[01:40.02]
[01:44.41]See I ain't try to hurt you baby
[01:46.91]No no, no I just wanna work you baby
[01:49.70]Yupyup
[01:50.48]See I ain't try to hurt you baby
[01:52.60]No no, no I just wanna work you baby
[01:55.51]If you scared you better run (You better run)
[01:58.30]You better run (You better run)
[01:59.67]You better run (You better run)
[02:01.07]You better you better you better
[02:02.94]
[02:03.08]Run run runaway, runaway baby
[02:05.69]Before I put my spell on you
[02:08.11]You better get get getaway getaway darling
[02:11.45]'Cause everything you heard is true
[02:13.77]Your poor little heart will end up alone
[02:16.93]'Cause what knows I'm a rolling stone
[02:19.62]So you better run run runaway runaway baby!
[02:23.88]
[02:25.04]Bruno Mars - Runaway Baby
[02:26.02]
[02:27.04]
